title: riot employees
body: bought 100 dollars of riot points havent gotten any  of it has been 5hours were is it{{champion:12}}

replies.body: If an RP purchase doesn't update your balance right away, it may indicate that the transaction is still processing or failed to go through at all.  Looking into your specific issue, I wasn't able to find any issues.  Feel free to reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need any context towards your recent transactions.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
